englishTranslationText:
Allah	will	say,	“Remain	rebuked	in	it,	and	
do	not	speak	to	Me.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Rab	farmāye	ga	dutkāre	(Zaleel	Hokar)	
pade	raho	is	meiñ,	aur	mujhse	bāt	na	karo

arabicText: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا وَٱرْحَمْنَا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
"Indeed	there	was	a	group	among	My	
bondmen	who	said,	'Our	Lord!	We	have	
accepted	faith,	therefore	forgive	us	and	
have	mercy	on	us,	and	You	are	the	Best	
Among	The	Merciful.'	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	Mere	bandoñ	ka	ek	giroh	kehtā	thā	
aye	hamāre	Rab	ham	Imān	lāye	to	hameiñ	
baksh	de	aur	hampar	Raḥem	kar	aur	tu	
sabse	behtar	raḥem	karne		wāla	hai

arabicText: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا حَتَّىٰٓ أَنسَوْكُمْ ذِكْرِى وَكُنتُم مِّنْهُمْ تَضْحَكُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“So	you	took	them	for	a	mockery	until	
your	mocking	at	them	made	you	forget	
My	remembrance,	and	you	used	to	laugh	
at	them!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Tumne	unheiñ	tha-thā	banā	liyā	yahāñ	
tak	ke	unheiñ	banāne	ke	shughl	meiñ	meri	
yād	bhool	gaye	aur	tum	unse	hañsā	karte

arabicText: إِنِّى جَزَيْتُهُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“Indeed	this	day	I	have	rewarded	them	for	
their	endurance,	so	that	it	is	they	who	are	
the	successful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
.Beshak	āaj	maiñ	ne	unke	sabr	ka	unheiñ	
yeh	badlā	diyā	ke	wohi	kāmiyāb	haiñ.

arabicText: قَـٰلَ كَمْ لَبِثْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	will	say,	“How	long	did	you	stay	on	
earth,	counting	by	the	number	of	years?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farmāyā	tum	zameen	meiñ	kitnā	thahre	
barsoñ	ki	ginti	se

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ لَبِثْنَا يَوْمًا أَوْ بَعْضَ يَوْمٍۢ فَسْـَٔلِ ٱلْعَآدِّينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	will	say,	“We	stayed	a	day	or	part	of	
a	day,	so	ask	those	who	keep	count.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Bole:	ham	ek	din	rahe	ya	din	ka	hissa	to	gin	ne	wāloñ	se	daryāft	farmā

arabicText: قَـٰلَ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا ۖ لَّوْ أَنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText: He	will	say,	“You	stayed	but	only	a	little,	if	you	knew.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Farmāyā	tum	na	thehre	magar	thodā	agar	tumheiñ	‘Ilm	hotā	.

arabicText: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ أَنَّمَا خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ عَبَثًۭا وَأَنَّكُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا تُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText: So	do	you	think	that	We	have	created	you	needlessly,	and	that	you	do	not	have	to	return	to	Us?
romanUrduTranslationText: .To	kya	yeh	samjhte	ho	ke	hamne	tumheiñ	bekār	banāyā,	aur	tumheiñ	hamāri	taraf	phirnā	nahiñ?

arabicText: فَتَعَـٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمَلِكُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
So	Most	Supreme	is	Allah,	the	True	King;	there	is	no	God	except	Him;	Lord	of	the	Throne	of	
Honour.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	bahut	bulandi	wāla	hai	Allah	sacchā	Bādshāh	koi	mā’bood	nahiñ	siwā	uske	‘izzat	wāle	‘arsh	ka	
mālik

arabicText: وَمَن يَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرْهَـٰنَ لَهُۥ بِهِۦ فَإِنَّمَا حِسَابُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفْلِحُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	one	who	worships	any	other	God	along	with	Allah	–	of	which	he	does	not	have	any	
proof	–	his	account	is	with	his	Lord;	indeed	there	is	no	salvation	for	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	Allah	ke	sāth	kisi	doosre	khudā	ko	pooje	jiski	uske	pās	koi	sanad	nahiñ	to	uskā	hisāb	uske	
Rab	ke	yahāñ	hai	be-shak	kāfiroñ	ka	chutkārā	nahiñ	.

arabicText: وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ وَٱرْحَمْ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	say,	“My	Lord!	Forgive	and	
have	mercy,	and	You	are	the	Best	of	all	the	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	‘Arz	karo	Aye	mere	Rab!	Baksh	de	aur	Raḥem	farmā	aur	tu	sabse	bartar	raḥem		karne		
wāla.

arabicText: سُورَةٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهَا وَفَرَضْنَـٰهَا وَأَنزَلْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	a	chapter	which	We	have	sent	
down	and	decreed	its	commands,	and	in	
which	We	have	sent	down	clear	verses,	in	
order	that	you	may	ponder.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	ek	surat	hai	ke	Hamne	utāri	aur	
Hamne	iske	ahkām	Farz	kiye	aur	Hamne	
us	meiñ	raushan	Āyateiñ	nāzil	farmāyeiñ	
ke	tum	dhiyān	karo	.

arabicText: ٱلزَّانِيَةُ وَٱلزَّانِى فَٱجْلِدُوا۟ كُلَّ وَٰحِدٍۢ مِّنْهُمَا مِا۟ئَةَ جَلْدَةٍۢ ۖ وَلَا تَأْخُذْكُم بِهِمَا رَأْفَةٌۭ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ ۖ وَلْيَشْهَدْ عَذَابَهُمَا طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	adulteress	and	the	adulterer	-	punish	
each	one	of	them	with	a	hundred	lashes;	
and	may	you	not	have	pity	on	them	in	the	
religion	of	Allah,	if	you	believe	in	Allah	
and	the	Last	Day;	and	a	group	of	believers	
must	witness	their	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	aurat	badkār	ho	aur	jo	mard	to	un	meiñ	
har	ek	ko	sau	(100)	kode	lagāo	aur	
tumheiñ	unpar	taras	na	āye	Allah	ke	Deen	
meiñ	agar	tum	Imān	lāte	ho	Allah	aur	
pichle	din	par	aur	chāhiye	ke	unki	sazā	ke	
waqt	musalmānoñ	ka	ek	giroh	hāzir	ho

arabicText: ٱلزَّانِى لَا يَنكِحُ إِلَّا زَانِيَةً أَوْ مُشْرِكَةًۭ وَٱلزَّانِيَةُ لَا يَنكِحُهَآ إِلَّا زَانٍ أَوْ مُشْرِكٌۭ ۚ وَحُرِّمَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	adulterer	shall	not	marry	except	an	
adulteress	or	a	polytheist	woman,	and	
none	shall	marry	an	adulteress	except	an	
adulterer	or	a	polytheist;	and	this	is	
forbidden	for	the	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Badkār	mard	nikāh	na	kare	magar	badkār	
aurat	ya	shirk	wāli	se	aur	badkār	aurat	se	
nikāh	na	kare	magar	badkār	mard	ya	
mushrik	aur	yeh	kām	Imān	wāloñ	par	
harām	hai
